attributes.action: Stop the ban on battery farming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This ban is not necessary. If people really didn't want battery eggs, they wouldn't buy them and that would serve as a natural barrier to battery farming. The fact that they aren't goes to show that this ban isn't wanted/required. 

By banning battery farming, it will only serve to put more people on the poverty line.
